verbs.description: Robert De Niro [V: was] received with a standing ovation at the Tony Awards on Sunday ( June 10 ) when he said " F--- Trump " onstage .
[ARG1: Robert De Niro] was [V: received] [ARGM-MNR: with a standing ovation] [ARGM-LOC: at the Tony Awards] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday ( June 10 )] [ARGM-TMP: when he said " F--- Trump " onstage] .
Robert De Niro was received with a standing ovation at the Tony Awards on Sunday ( June 10 ) [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [V: said] [ARG1: " F--- Trump] " [ARGM-LOC: onstage] .
